p: Ar-turmerone exhibited hepatoprotective, anticancer, and cholagogic effects against hepatobiliary diseases. Ar-turmerone improved the ethanol-induced reduction in the cell viability of hepatocytes isolated from SD male rats [ 30]. In normal Wistar rats, intraduodenal injection of ar-turmerone increased the volume of total bile acids and bile secretion [ 71]. In addition, ar-turmerone caused significant inhibitory effects on the cell proliferation of three HCC cells, namely, HepG2, Huh-7, and Hep3B. In particular, ar-turmerone induced both regulation of Bax and p53 upregulated modulator of apoptosis (PUMA) of the intrinsic apoptotic pathway and caspase activation of the extrinsic apoptotic pathway [ 85].
